mysticmod:AcidSplash.NAME: Acid Splash
mysticmod:AcidSplash.DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Deal !D! damage. Draw a card.

mysticmod:Alacrity.NAME: Alacrity
mysticmod:Alacrity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Technical: gain [E] next turn.

mysticmod:AllIn.NAME: All In
mysticmod:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Become Weak for !M! turns.

mysticmod:ArcaneAccuracy.NAME: Arcane Accuracy
mysticmod:ArcaneAccuracy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Spell during your turn, gain 1 Strength until end of turn.
mysticmod:ArcaneAccuracy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Spell during your turn, gain 1 Strength until end of turn.

mysticmod:ArcaneDodge.NAME: Arcane Dodge
mysticmod:ArcaneDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Arcane: gain an additional !M! Block.

mysticmod:BladeBurst.NAME: Blade Burst
mysticmod:BladeBurst.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Strength. Deal !D! damage. Add a Magic Weapon to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:BladeBurst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Strength. Deal !D! damage. Add a Magic Weapon+ to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:BladeMaster.NAME: Blade Master
mysticmod:BladeMaster.DESCRIPTION: Return up to !M! Artes from your discard pile to your hand.

mysticmod:BulkUp.NAME: Bulk Up
mysticmod:BulkUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, then Exhaust a random card in your hand. NL Arcane: Choose what to Exhaust.

mysticmod:ChargedParry.NAME: Charged Parry
mysticmod:ChargedParry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Arcane: Gain !M! Strength this turn.

mysticmod:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmod:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals damage equal to !M! times the total number of Spells and Artes played this turn X times.

mysticmod:ComboCaster.NAME: Combo Caster
mysticmod:ComboCaster.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a random Cantrip to your hand.

mysticmod:ComponentsPouch.NAME: Components Pouch
mysticmod:ComponentsPouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Spell in your hand.

mysticmod:Daze.NAME: Diversion
mysticmod:Daze.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Technical: apply !M! Weak.

mysticmod:Discipline.NAME: Discipline
mysticmod:Discipline.DESCRIPTION: Begin each turn as if you had already played one Spell and one Arte.

mysticmod:DiviningBlow.NAME: Divining Blow
mysticmod:DiviningBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Arcane: draw !M! cards.

mysticmod:Doublecast.NAME: Doublecast
mysticmod:Doublecast.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Spell is played twice.
mysticmod:Doublecast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next two Spells are played twice.

mysticmod:EarthenWall.NAME: Earthen Wall
mysticmod:EarthenWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

mysticmod:EbbAndFlow.NAME: Ebb and Flow
mysticmod:EbbAndFlow.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, draw 1 card, then discard 2 cards unless you have a Spell and an Arte.
mysticmod:EbbAndFlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Each turn, draw 1 card, then discard 2 cards unless you have a Spell and an Arte.

mysticmod:EnchantedMoulinet.NAME: Enchanted Moulinet
mysticmod:EnchantedMoulinet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. If any of those enemies die, gain [E] .

mysticmod:EnergizedRift.NAME: Energized Rift
mysticmod:EnergizedRift.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Cantrip to your hand, then duplicate all Cantrips in your hand. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:EnergizedRift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Cantrip to your hand, then duplicate all Cantrips in your hand. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:Feint.NAME: Feint
mysticmod:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a random Cantrip to your hand.
mysticmod:Feint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a random Upgraded Cantrip to your hand.

mysticmod:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
mysticmod:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Technical: deal it to ALL enemies.

mysticmod:FiveFootStep.NAME: 5 Foot Step
mysticmod:FiveFootStep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Arcane: Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

mysticmod:FloatingDisk.NAME: Floating Disk
mysticmod:FloatingDisk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Technical: gain !M! Dexterity. Exhaust.

mysticmod:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
mysticmod:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Costs [E] less per Spell or Arte played this turn. NL Deal !D! damage twice, then double the Spell and Arte count.

mysticmod:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
mysticmod:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Arcane: !B! times instead

mysticmod:GeminiForm.NAME: Gemini Form
mysticmod:GeminiForm.DESCRIPTION: For the first Spell and Arte you play each turn, play a random card of the other type from your draw pile. NL Ethereal.
mysticmod:GeminiForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For the first Spell and Arte you play each turn, play a random card of the other type from your draw pile.

mysticmod:Grapple.NAME: Grapple
mysticmod:Grapple.DESCRIPTION: Target loses 20 Strength this turn. Can't use the same turn as an Attack. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.
mysticmod:Grapple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target loses 20 Strength this turn. Can't use the same turn as an Attack. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

mysticmod:Grease.NAME: Grease
mysticmod:Grease.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Technical: ALL enemies instead.

mysticmod:GreaterInvisibility.NAME: Greater Invisibility
mysticmod:GreaterInvisibility.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL If you did not play !M! Artes this turn, Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
mysticmod:GreaterInvisibility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL If you did not play an Arte this turn, Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

mysticmod:IllusionOfCalm.NAME: Illusion Of Calm
mysticmod:IllusionOfCalm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Become Frail for !M! turns.

mysticmod:Haste.NAME: Haste
mysticmod:Haste.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and Draw 1 card each turn. NL Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.
mysticmod:Haste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and Draw 1 card each turn. NL Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:HunkerDown.NAME: Hunker Down
mysticmod:HunkerDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity until the end of the turn.

mysticmod:KnowledgePool.NAME: Knowledge Pool
mysticmod:KnowledgePool.DESCRIPTION: Choose one of 3 random Spell cards and add it to your hand. it costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:LightningBolt.NAME: Lightning Bolt
mysticmod:LightningBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Technical: Deal !M! damage instead.

mysticmod:Lunge.NAME: Lunge
mysticmod:Lunge.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Lose 4 Dexterity this turn. NL Exhaust. Feat.
mysticmod:Lunge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Lose 4 Dexterity this turn. NL Exhaust. Feat.

mysticmod:MagicMissile.NAME: Magic Missile
mysticmod:MagicMissile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each time the deck was shuffled this combat.

mysticmod:MagicWeapon.NAME: Magic Weapon
mysticmod:MagicWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Add a Blade Burst to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:MagicWeapon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Add a Blade Burst+ to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:MightyMagic.NAME: Mighty Magic
mysticmod:MightyMagic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Arte during your turn, gain 1 Dexterity until end of turn.
mysticmod:MightyMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play an Arte during your turn, gain 1 Dexterity until end of turn.

mysticmod:MirrorEntity.NAME: Mirror Entity
mysticmod:MirrorEntity.DESCRIPTION: Spells and Artes also advance next turn's Spells and Artes counter.

mysticmod:MirrorStrike.NAME: Mirror Strike
mysticmod:MirrorStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Arcane: For every two spells played this turn, deal another !D! damage.

mysticmod:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
mysticmod:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Spells and Artes deal 1 more damage and gain 1 more Block for each card of the other type played this turn

mysticmod:MysticalShield.NAME: Mystical Shield
mysticmod:MysticalShield.DESCRIPTION: Block is reduced to 10 instead of 0 at the start of your turn.
mysticmod:MysticalShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block is set to 10 instead of 0 at the start of your turn.

mysticmod:Natural20.NAME: Natural 20
mysticmod:Natural20.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack this turn does double damage. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:Natural20.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack this turn does double damage.

mysticmod:ObscuringMist.NAME: Obscuring Mist
mysticmod:ObscuringMist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Technical: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:PowerAttack.NAME: Power Attack
mysticmod:PowerAttack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !D! Strength and lose !M! Dexterity this turn. NL Feat.

mysticmod:PreparedCaster.NAME: Prepared Caster
mysticmod:PreparedCaster.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose one Spell from your draw pile and add it to your hand. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:Prestidigitation.NAME: Prestidigitation
mysticmod:Prestidigitation.DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Gain !B! Block. Draw a card.

mysticmod:PunishingArmor.NAME: Punishing Armor
mysticmod:PunishingArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Technical: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:PureInstinct.NAME: Pure Instinct
mysticmod:PureInstinct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every Arte in your hand.

mysticmod:RapidCaster.NAME: Rapid Caster
mysticmod:RapidCaster.DESCRIPTION: The first Cantrip you play each turn is played twice.
mysticmod:RapidCaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first Cantrip you play each turn is played twice.

mysticmod:RayOfFrost.NAME: Ray Of Frost
mysticmod:RayOfFrost.DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Draw a card.

mysticmod:ReadMagic.NAME: Read Magic
mysticmod:ReadMagic.DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Draw !M! cards, then discard 1 card. Exhaust.
mysticmod:ReadMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Draw !M! cards, then discard 2 cards. Exhaust

mysticmod:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
mysticmod:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable.

mysticmod:SpellCombat.NAME: Spell Combat
mysticmod:SpellCombat.DESCRIPTION: Arcane: deal !D! damage X times. NL Technical: Gain !B! Block X times.

mysticmod:SpellRecall.NAME: Spell Recall
mysticmod:SpellRecall.DESCRIPTION: Return a Spell from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:SpellRecall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return a Spell from your discard pile to your hand.

mysticmod:Shield.NAME: Shield
mysticmod:Shield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.

mysticmod:ShockingGrasp.NAME: Shocking Grasp
mysticmod:ShockingGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Technical: deal !M! damage instead.

mysticmod:Sideswipe.NAME: Sideswipe
mysticmod:Sideswipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Arcane: Apply !M! weak.

mysticmod:Spark.NAME: Spark
mysticmod:Spark.DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Draw a card, then gain [E] if the card is a Spell or an Arte. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:Spark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Draw a card, then gain [E] if the card is a Spell or an Arte.

mysticmod:Spellstrike.NAME: Spellstrike
mysticmod:Spellstrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Search your draw pile for an Attack Spell and play it. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:SpontaneousCaster.NAME: Spontaneous Caster
mysticmod:SpontaneousCaster.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Spell, exhaust it and add a random Spell to your discard pile.
mysticmod:SpontaneousCaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Spell, exhaust it and add a random Spell to your discard pile.

mysticmod:Stoneskin.NAME: Stoneskin
mysticmod:Stoneskin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 2 Block at the start of the next !M! turns.

mysticmod:StyleChange.NAME: Style Change
mysticmod:StyleChange.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Arte to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:SuddenClarity.NAME: Sudden Clarity
mysticmod:SuddenClarity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card

mysticmod:SummonFamiliar.NAME: Summon Familiar
mysticmod:SummonFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: Summon your faithful Fox Familiar. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:TomeOfSpells.NAME: Tome Of Spells
mysticmod:TomeOfSpells.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Cantrips to your hand. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:VorpalThrust.NAME: Vorpal Thrust
mysticmod:VorpalThrust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Arcane: If you played two Spells this turn, deal !M! damage instead.
